description: PORTLAND, Ore. (Dec. 10, 2012) — National College of Natural Medicine announced today that it received a $220,000 grant from the M.J. Murdock Charitable Trust for the renovation of NCNM's Helfgott Research Institute and Community Education Center. The grant is the largest NCNM has ever received from a private charitable foundation. cleaned_text: Dec. 11, 2012 The grant is the largest NCNM has ever received from a private charitable foundation. Nov. 13, 2012 NCNM announced the promotion of Melanie Henriksen, ND, LAc, CNM, as dean of the School of Naturopathic Medicine after completing a national search to fill the position. Aug. 27, 2012 The grant will support NCNM's new integrative medicine research facility. Aug. 14, 2012 Manes, whose 13 years of board service spanned a significant period of growth and national recognition for the accredited natural medicine college, was recognized for his outstanding service to NCNM. Aug. 2, 2012 NCNM will offer free weekly community and continuing education lectures through mid-September in its Min Zidell Healing Garden. June 18, 2012 NCNM has signed a transfer of net assets agreement with Women in Balance Association, a nonprofit organization dedicated to educating women and health professionals about the health impact of hormone imbalance as women age. March 22, 2012 Program provides quality and safety assurance of nutritional supplements to healthcare practitioners and their patients March 13, 2012 The college commissioned the economic impact study to better assess its role in Portland's economy as the college prepares its 20-year master plan to help drive future planning and decision-making. Dec. 13, 2011 Dr. Marinelli is a clinical authority on pain management and natural medicine. In 2005, he was appointed by Governor Ted Kulongoski to the Oregon Pain Commission, where he continues to serve. Nov. 16, 2011 NCNM encourages a thoughtful analysis of the use of supplements, while reminding patients of the need to consult with a primary care provider before beginning a supplement regimen.
